item.title: Hypocrisy
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: Jimmy Swaggart broke the 7th Commandment (adultery) years ago, now "he's advocating breaking the 6th Commandment":http://story.news.yahoo.com/news?tmpl=story2&u=/po/evangelistapologizesforkillgaysremark (murder). How many of the 10 Commandments are you allowed to break before you're no longer considered a Christian leader?
